评论概述: These are seriously the most comfortable shoes I've ever owned.
评论详情: I'm on my second pair because I literally wear them for everything. They are so comfortable as far as casual shoes go. The color in the picture is pretty accurate and they are canvas so they're not really that easy to clean, but the color hides dirt well. These shoes seem to get better with age if I'm being honest. They look better after some wear. This review is asking to provide information on slip resistance and I would NOT advise you get them if you need anything slip resistant. Use your brain, TBH you shouldjust know what shoes you can and can't wear in slippery conditions.
These shoes are sized in u.s Men's, i.e. #7 women's size is #5 men's.

I LOVE these shoes. I've had them for a bit now and they are holding up very good. I have had my eye on this style for a few years. A coworker had them and I thought they were so cute! Anyway, I don’t work with her anymore and I thought I should order them and give them a try. I am so happy I did! I have wide feet and Rocket Dogs have always been a good fit for me and these turned out to be so versatile.  I can wear them with no show socks when the weather is hot or thick winter socks when it is cold here in Michigan. I would love to see better traction in Rocket Dog’s sneakers, but for now I will still be rockin’ this style as is.

评论概述: I AM IN LOVE WITH ROCKETDOG!
评论详情: I had never heard of or seen Rocketdog shoes before. But when I saw the ad on Amazon and saw these with the 3 cute buckles I had to have them. When I got them I wore them out when I went to breakfast that morning. Somebody came up to me to ask if my shies were Rocketdog shoes. I thought it was really neat that people knew what they were the moment they saw them.  I think it's how distinct the soles are on the shoes.  Its not so different that it makes the shoes "loud" just unique enough to get noticed.  They're really easy to keep clean and they're really comfortable to wear. The soles inside are very soft and comfortable and I put these shoes through a lot of wear and tear Already in the couple months that I've had them. They still look brand new! I am so happy with the value and style and comfort of these shoes, I went ahead and bought a pair of ankle type boots from Rocketdog. I expect good things but I'll be sure to let you know!
